if it is a very entertaining movie, there is humor, action and many special effects, too many good ones, and the fight between thotk or hul was good too

est one right?

 wise.

no, in this film they were more than anything in the action, and in the confrontation of the bad against the good, what happens is that there are so many characters together who had to dedicate their time to each one.

or was it?
two hours, it's long but very entertaining

in the second of the avengers there is the feeling that other characters are coming, very strong for the avengers to inflate them, I hope the infinity avengers
